scripts.build: node build/prepare.js && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: npm run prepare-client && npm run compile-tv && npm run compile-web
scripts.start: npm run build && node build/minify.js && npm run run
scripts.start-debug: npm run build && npm run run-debug
scripts.build-run-server-debug: npm run build-server && npm run run-debug
